text: Literati may refer to: *Intellectuals or those who love, read, and comment on literature *The scholar-official or literati of imperial/medieval China **Literati painting, also known as the Southern School of painting, developed by Chinese literati **The literati style of bonsai, consisting of thin, elegant trees in the calligraphic style of literati painting **Confucianism, known as the School of Literati *The game Literati, a variant of Scrabble developed by Yahoo! Games *Literati (book club), children's book club
title: Literati
